Footer.Description1: You’re in luck! You have landed on the best online casino. But that’s not all, our platform welcomes players from around the world too. Try your luck on our extraordinary selection of games and become one of the luckiest players out there!
Footer.Description2: Grab your lucky charms and play to land the Europa777 and more. Simply register an account and charm your way to bonuses to add to your lucky break!
Footer.whyChooseDes: Great service, huge bonuses and a broad choice of games
Footer.whyChooseDes1: Choose 1 of the 4 available currencies to play in and good news for crypto players, your cryptocurrency will be converted to play.
Footer.whyChooseDes2: We use encryption technology to ensure all your transactions are safe and secure when transacting. You won’t need luck on your side here as this is always a guarantee.
Footer.whyChooseDes3: We pride ourselves to offer you the best customer support no matter what time, all year round.Our Support Team are professional and knowledgeable about all things casino.
Footer.whyChooseDes4: We have put all measures in place to operate fairly and correctly when it comes to your winnings and the outcome of the games on offer so that you always get results that you can trust.

VipPage.description: Become a part of our exclusive VIP Team and gain membership in the VIP Program! Enjoy gaming at our casino for a chance to receive our weekly VIP cashback package!
VipPage.title1: The best VIP program in the world
VipPage.title2Des: Get rewarded every single day with our unbeatable daily cashback offers.
VipPage.title3Des: Watch your wins grow with our fantastic weekly cashback, ensuring you always come out ahead.
VipPage.title4Des: Feel the thrill every 15 minutes with free scratch cards, giving you a chance to win prizes up to $200!
VipPage.title5Des: Spin the Bonus Wheel every 2 hours for a chance to win up to 500 Free Spins!

CashbackPage.description: Our cashback bonus has a very simple rule: the more you deposit, the more you get back! Enjoy up to 20% cashback that is credited every single day.
CashbackPage.listDes1: Cashback is given on the deposit amount during the previous day from 00:00 to 23:59(UTC). The total amount of received cashback cannot exceed 20% of the total amount of all Players deposits.
CashbackPage.listDes2: Cashback is credited to the Player"s account automatically every day at 02:00 AM (UTC).
CashbackPage.listDes3: The maximum amount of cashback that can be credited to the Player"s account is 20% of the total amount of all deposits made by the Player during the previous day.
CashbackPage.listDes4: Wager requirement for cashback bonus is x3.
CashbackPage.listDes5: Validity of the cashback is 3 days from its receipt and 7 days after its activation.
CashbackPage.listDes6: Cashback will not be credited if the real money loss for the previous day was less than BTC 0.0008 / BCH 0.13 / DOGE 250 / ETH 0.013 / LTC 0.30 / USDT 20 / XRP 33 / TRX 250 / ADA 33 / BNB 0.067 / USDC 20 / BUSD 20.
CashbackPage.listDes7: You must have no pending withdrawals in order to claim Daily Cashback
CashbackPage.listDes8: Any abuse in order to obtain a cashback bonus is prohibited; in particular, the use of the opposite bets strategy in table games is prohibited (e.g. simultaneous betting on both red and black in roulette, or other similar bet types).
CashbackPage.listDes9: For successful withdrawal of funds gained with a cashback bonus, the Player must meet the wagering requirement for the total amount of deposits made during the day of at least three (3) times (i.e. total wager amount equals the amount of deposits for the day multiplied by 3) no later than 23:59 UTC of the day on which these deposits were made.
CashbackPage.listDes10: In the case of detection of the cashback bonus rules abuse or failure to comply with the wagering requirements specified in paragraph 8 of these rules, the Casino may cancel and seize all winnings gained with an active cashback bonus, as well as to confiscate an amount equal to the amount of cashback bonus received.

termsAndConditionPage.generalLine1: Before using our website, please read these Terms and Conditions carefully. By registering a Player Account with the website you agree and confirm your consent with the Terms and Conditions.
termsAndConditionPage.generalLine2: It is the Player's sole responsibility to inquire about the existing laws and regulations of the given jurisdiction for online gambling.
termsAndConditionPage.generalLine3: These Terms and Conditions entered into force on 26th Sep 2022, last updated 26th Sep 2022. You are required to read them before you start using the services of Europa777 Casino. If you do not agree to these Terms and Conditions, you are forbidden to continue using the services offered by this Casino.
termsAndConditionPage.generalLine4: If you proceed to register an account and make use of the services offered by www.Europa777.com, you consent with these Terms and Conditions.
termsAndConditionPage.generalLine5: Refer to the Responsible Gambling Policy hosted on our website that provides the necessary information on the existing measures to ensure the safety of Players while participating in the casino games on offer.
termsAndConditionPage.termsAndConditionLine1: We reserve the right to unilaterally change these Terms and Conditions when such need occurs. We will do our best to notify our Players of any significant changes timeously via email. However, we do recommend all Players to revisit this page regularly and check for possible changes.
termsAndConditionPage.termsAndConditionLine2: Any amendments to the Terms and Conditions are deemed effective immediately upon posting on the Casino website.
termsAndConditionPage.termsAndConditionLine3: Using the services of the Casino after the publication of the amendments is a confirmation of your acceptance of these amendments.
termsAndConditionPage.termsAndConditionLine4: The main language of the Casino website, including these Terms and Conditions, is English, and any translation errors are interpreted in favor of the Casino.
termsAndConditionPage.acceptPlayer1: The Casino accepts Players only from those countries and geographic locations where online gambling is allowed by law in their jurisdictions. It is the Player's sole responsibility to inquire about the existing gambling laws and regulations of the given jurisdiction before placing any bets on the website.
termsAndConditionPage.acceptPlayer2: The Casino accepts strictly adult Players (the minimum age is 18) only and Players who have reached the age specified by the jurisdiction of Player's place of residence as eligible for online gaming. It is the Player's sole responsibility to inquire about the existing laws and regulations of the given jurisdiction regarding age limitations for online gambling.
termsAndConditionPage.acceptPlayer3: It is entirely and solely the Player's responsibility to enquire and ensure that you do not breach laws applicable to you by participating in the games. Depositing real funds and playing for real money is subject to the laws of your country, and it is your sole responsibility to abide by your native regulations.
termsAndConditionPage.acceptPlayer4: The Company reserves the right to request proof of age from the Player and limit access to the Website or suspend the Player Account to those Players who fail to meet this requirement or have been found to be underage.
termsAndConditionPage.acceptPlayer5: Players from the following countries and their territories (“Restricted Countries”) are not allowed to deposit and play real money games: Afghanistan, Aruba, Bonaire, Burma, Congo, Curacao, Eritrea, Ethiopia, France, Iran, Iraq, Libya, Malaysia, Myanmar, The Netherlands, North Korea, Palestine, Saba, Singapore, Somalia, Statia, St. Maarten, Sudan, Syria, Singapore, Ukraine, United Kingdom, Yemen, and Zimbabwe. The Casino cannot guarantee successful processing of withdrawals or refunds in the event that Player breaches this Restricted Countries policy.
termsAndConditionPage.acceptedCurrenciesLine1: The website accepts the following currencies for use of play:
termsAndConditionPage.fessAndTaxesLine: It is the Player's full responsibility for paying all fees and taxes applied to your winnings according to the laws of the jurisdiction of your residence.
termsAndConditionPage.availabilityOfGamesLine1: Take note that some games may be unavailable in certain jurisdictions, as required by the policies of game providers which may change from time to time.
termsAndConditionPage.availabilityOfGamesLine2: Using VPN to bypass provider's block is strictly prohibited and may lead to the confiscation of winnings.
termsAndConditionPage.availabilityOfGamesLine3: NetEnt games are unavailable for Afghanistan, Albania, Algeria, Angola, Australia, Bahamas, Botswana, Belgium, Bulgaria, Colombia, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Ecuador, Ethiopia, France, Ghana, Guyana, Hong Kong, Italy, Iran, Iraq, Israel, Kuwait, Latvia, Lithuania, Mexico, Namibia, Nicaragua, North Korea, Pakistan, Panama, Philippines, Portugal, Romania, Singapore, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Sudan, Syria, Taiwan, Trinidad and Tobago, Tunisia, Uganda, United Kingdom, United States of America, Yemen, and Zimbabwe.
termsAndConditionPage.availabilityOfGamesLine4: In addition to the above, the following games are not available to territories as mentioned next to them:
termsAndConditionPage.availabilityOfGamesLine5: Street Fighter Video Slot: Anguilla, Antigua & Barbuda, Argentina, Aruba, Barbados, Bahamas, Belize, Bermuda, Bolivia, Bonaire, Brazil, British Virgin Islands, Europa, Cayman Islands, China, Chile, Clipperton Island, Columbia, Costa Rica, Cuba, Curacao, Dominica, Dominican Republic, El Salvador, Greenland, Grenada, Guadeloupe, Guatemala, Guyana, Haiti, Honduras, Jamaica, Japan, Martinique, Mexico, Montserrat, Navassa Island, Paraguay, Peru, Puerto Rico, Saba, Saint Barthelemy, Saint Eustatius, Saint Kitts and Nevis, Saint Lucia, Saint Maarten, Saint Martin, Saint Pierre and Miquelon, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, South Korea, Suriname, Turks and Caicos Islands, United States of America, Uruguay, US Virgin Islands, Venezuela.
termsAndConditionPage.availabilityOfGamesLine6: Fashion TV Video Slot: Cuba, Jordan, Turkey, and Saudi Arabia.
termsAndConditionPage.availabilityOfGamesLine7: Planet of the Apes Video Slot: Azerbaijan, China, India, Malaysia, Qatar, Russia, Thailand, Turkey, and Ukraine.
termsAndConditionPage.availabilityOfGamesLine8: Vikings Video Slot: Azerbaijan, Cambodia, Europa, China, France, India, Indonesia, Laos, Malaysia, Myanmar, Papua New Guinea, Qatar, Russia, South Korea, Thailand, Turkey, Ukraine, United States of America.
termsAndConditionPage.availabilityOfGamesLine9: Narcos Video Slot: Indonesia and South Korea.
termsAndConditionPage.availabilityOfGamesLine10: Additionally, Universal Monsters (Dracula, Creature from the Black Lagoon, Phantoms Curse and The Invisible Man), are only available to play in the following territories: Andorra, Armenia, Azerbaijan, Belarus, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Georgia, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Moldova, Monaco, Montenegro, Norway, Russia, San Marino, Serbia, Ukraine, North Macedonia, Turkey, Austria, Cyprus, Finland, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Slovakia and Slovenia.
termsAndConditionPage.availabilityOfGamesLine11: Players from the following countries are not eligible to win any jackpots from jackpot games offered by NetEnt (such as but not limited to Mega Fortune): Australia, Azerbaijan, China, Denmark, India, Israel, Italy, Japan, Malaysia, Qatar, Russia, Spain, Thailand, Tunisia, Turkey, United Arab Emirates, Ukraine. The Casino will make reasonable efforts to prevent Players from these countries to reach the games, but if Players from any of the stated countries would win the jackpot, the jackpot win will be annulled.
termsAndConditionPage.gameRulesLine: By accepting these Terms and Conditions you confirm that you are aware and understand the rules of the games offered on the Website. It is at your discretion to familiarise yourself with the theoretical payout percentage of each game.
termsAndConditionPage.disclaimerOfLiabilitiesLine1: By accepting these Terms and Conditions you confirm your awareness of the fact that gambling may lead to losing money. The Casino is not liable for any possible financial damage arising from your use of the Website, as the use of our services is entirely used at your own risk.
termsAndConditionPage.disclaimerOfLiabilitiesLine2: The Casino is not liable of any hardware or software defects, unstable or lost Internet connection, or any other technical errors that may limit access to the Website or prevent any Players from uninterrupted play.
termsAndConditionPage.disclaimerOfLiabilitiesLine3: In the unlikely case where a wager is confirmed or a payment is performed by us in error, the Company reserves the right to cancel all wagers accepted containing such an error, or to correct the mistake by re-settling all the wagers at the correct terms that should have been available at the time that the wager was placed in the absence of the error.
termsAndConditionPage.disclaimerOfLiabilitiesLine4: If the Casino mistakenly credits your Player Account with a deposit, bonus and/or winnings that do not belong to you, whether due to a technical issue, error in the paytables, human error or otherwise, the amount and/or the winnings from such bonus or deposit will remain the Casino property and will be deducted from your Player Account. If you have withdrawn funds that do not belong to you prior to us becoming aware of the error, the mistakenly paid amount will (without prejudice to other remedies and actions that may be available at law) constitute a debt owed by you to us. In the unlikely event of incorrect crediting, you are obliged to notify us immediately by email.
termsAndConditionPage.disclaimerOfLiabilitiesLine5: The Casino, its directors, employees, partners, service providers:
termsAndConditionPage.disclaimerOfLiabilitiesLine6: Do not warrant that the software or the Website is/are fit for their purpose;
termsAndConditionPage.disclaimerOfLiabilitiesLine7: Do not warrant that the software and Website are free from errors;
termsAndConditionPage.disclaimerOfLiabilitiesLine8: Do not warrant that the Website and/or games will be accessible without interruptions;
termsAndConditionPage.disclaimerOfLiabilitiesLine9: Shall not be liable for any loss, costs, expenses or damages, whether direct, indirect, special, consequential, incidental or otherwise, arising in relation to your use of the Website or your participation in the games.
termsAndConditionPage.disclaimerOfLiabilitiesLine10: You hereby agree to fully indemnify and hold harmless the Casino, its directors, employees, partners, and service providers for any cost, expense, loss, damages, claims and liabilities howsoever caused that may arise in relation to your use of the Website or participation in the Games.
termsAndConditionPage.disclaimerOfLiabilitiesLine11: You acknowledge that the Casino shall be the final decision-maker of whether you have violated the Casino's Terms and Conditions in a manner that results in your suspension or permanent barring from participation in the Website.
termsAndConditionPage.useOfPlayerAccountLine1: Each Player is allowed to create only one (1) personal account intended for their sole use only.
termsAndConditionPage.useOfPlayerAccountLine2: Creating multiple Player Accounts by a single Player can lead to, at the sole discretion of the Casino, termination of all such accounts and cancellation of all payouts to the Player. The Player shall not provide access to their Player Account or allow using the Website to any third party, including but not limited to, minors.
termsAndConditionPage.useOfPlayerAccountLine3: Any returns, winnings or bonuses which the Player has gained or accrued during such time as the Duplicate Account was active, may be reclaimed by us. Players also undertake to return to us, on demand, any such funds which have been withdrawn from the Duplicate Account.
termsAndConditionPage.useOfPlayerAccountLine4: The Website can only be used for personal purposes and shall not be used for any type of commercial profit.
termsAndConditionPage.useOfPlayerAccountLine5: It is the Player's responsibility to maintain their account and keep their details up-to-date.
termsAndConditionPage.useOfPlayerAccountLine6: We reserve the right to make a phone call to the number provided in your user account, which at our own discretion can be a necessary part of the KYC procedure. Until the account is fully verified, no cashouts will be processed. In case the provided phone number is incorrect, missing or false or the Player will not answer the phone call, we reserve the right to confiscate your winnings and/or disable your user account. We shall make a concerted effort to contact you regarding the withdrawal of your funds; but, if we are unable to contact you via email or phone within 30 days of the date of the withdrawal request, the funds will be retained by the Company since you failed to complete the KYC procedure.
termsAndConditionPage.useOfPlayerAccountLine7: The following KYC procedure steps will be required:
termsAndConditionPage.useOfPlayerAccountLine8: A photo of the front of ID on a white piece of paper with 'today's' date written on it and player ID
termsAndConditionPage.useOfPlayerAccountLine9: which can be found in the player account after logging in
termsAndConditionPage.useOfPlayerAccountLine10: A photo of the back of your ID to show the expiry date
termsAndConditionPage.useOfPlayerAccountLine11: A selfie holding the front of your ID
termsAndConditionPage.useOfPlayerAccountLine12: Selfie holding the ID (no glare, no busy background; no cropping)
termsAndConditionPage.antiFraudPolicyLine1: The Company has a strict anti-fraud policy and utilises various anti-fraud tools and techniques. If the Player is suspected of fraudulent actions including (but not limited to):
termsAndConditionPage.antiFraudPolicyLine3: Development of strategies aimed at gaining of unfair winnings
termsAndConditionPage.antiFraudPolicyLine4: Chargeback transactions with a credit card or denial of some payments made
termsAndConditionPage.antiFraudPolicyLine5: Participating in any type of collusion with other Players
termsAndConditionPage.antiFraudPolicyLine6: Fraudulent actions against other online casinos or payment providers
termsAndConditionPage.antiFraudPolicyLine8: Or becomes bankrupt in the country of their residence, the Company reserves the right to terminate such a Player Account and suspend and/or cancel all payouts to the Player. This decision is at the sole discretion of the Company and the Player will not be notified or informed about the reasons of such actions. The Company also reserves the right and may be obliged to inform applicable regulatory bodies of the fraudulent actions performed by the Player.
termsAndConditionPage.antiFraudPolicyLine9: The Casino employs zero tolerance stance to advantage play. Any Player who will try to gain advantage of casino welcome offers or other promotions agrees that Company reserves the right to void bonuses and any winnings from such bonuses, for the reasons of:
termsAndConditionPage.antiFraudPolicyLine10: Creating more than one account in order to get advantage from casino promotions;
termsAndConditionPage.antiFraudPolicyLine15: Any other actions which may damage the Casino.
termsAndConditionPage.antiFraudPolicyLine16: The Casino reserves the right to close the Player's Player Account and to refund the Player the amount reflected in the account balance, subject to deduction of relevant withdrawal charges, at the Casino's absolute discretion and without any obligation to state a reason or give prior notice.
termsAndConditionPage.antiFraudPolicyLine17: In order to verify a Player's account, casino management will require documents (ID, payment systems, utility bills еtc) in Latin or Cyrillic alphabet as part of the KYC procedure. In case Player doesn't have an opportunity to provide documents in above-mentioned alphabets casino reserves the right to demand video verification where Player shows his/her documents.
termsAndConditionPage.antiFraudPolicyLine18: If there is a suspicion or evidence of gaming system manipulation, the Casino reserves the right to withhold payments. Any user or other person(s) who has/have manipulated the casino system or attempted to do so will face criminal prosecution. Any games or events offered on the Website are subject to termination and/or change at the discretion of the Casino.
termsAndConditionPage.antiFraudPolicyLine19: You agree not to take advantage of any probable faults or incompleteness in the software if you become aware of them. Furthermore, you promise to immediately notify the Casino of any error or incompleteness. If you fail to meet these responsibilities, the Casino is entitled to full compensation for all costs incurred as a result of the error or incompleteness, including any costs paid in connection with the error/incompleteness and the failed notification.
termsAndConditionPage.antiFraudPolicyLine20: Please take not that Europa777.com is not a financial institution and thus should not be treated as such as well as that the Player's account will not bear any interests.
termsAndConditionPage.depositingLine1: The Website offers a variety of payment methods that include:
termsAndConditionPage.depositingLine5: Crypto Wallets: BTC, LTC, ETH, TRX (Tron), BNB (Binance coin), BUSB (Binance USD)
termsAndConditionPage.depositingLine6: Please take note that cryptocurrencies will be converted into the fiat currency of choice selected when registering (i.e. EUR, USD, CAD, or GBP) once a deposit has been made.
termsAndConditionPage.depositingLine9: or live chat for further inquiries.
termsAndConditionPage.depositingLine10: The Company does not accept third party payments. A Player must make deposits only from a bank account, bank cards, e-wallets or other payment methods that are registered in the Player's own name. If, after security checks, it is determined that a Player has violated the above mentioned condition, the Player's winnings will be forfeited, and the original deposit will be returned to the account owner. The Company is not liable for any funds that have been lost due to third-party account transactions.
termsAndConditionPage.depositingLine11: Please note that the minimum deposit amount is 10 USD or currency equivalent equivalent and the maximum deposit amount is 10,000 USD or currency equivalent per transaction.
termsAndConditionPage.withdrawalPolicyLine1: The minimum withdrawal amount is 50 USD or currency equivalent equivalent and the maximum deposit amount is 10,000 USD or currency equivalent per 24-hour period.
termsAndConditionPage.withdrawalPolicyLine2: The Casino reserves the right to check your identity prior to processing payouts and to hold any refund or withdrawals for the time needed to check your identity. If false identification has been provided, the withdrawal can be refused and the Player Account terminated, of which the Player will be informed by email. Reporting by the Casino to applicable regulatory bodies of actions performed by the Player may be required.
termsAndConditionPage.withdrawalPolicyLine3: The Website supports payouts via Flutterware from Visa and Mastercard. Additional requirements are that the respective credit card is not a corporate credit card and the card is issued in a supported country.
termsAndConditionPage.withdrawalPolicyLine4: For Visa and Mastercard only the following countries are supported: Canada, The United Kingdom, America, Europe, Nigeria, Ghana, Kenya, South Africa, Uganda, and Tanzania.
termsAndConditionPage.withdrawalPolicyLine5: For Interac only Canada is supported.
termsAndConditionPage.withdrawalPolicyLine6: Please be aware that, even for supported countries, the Casino cannot guarantee that credit card payments will be processed successfully in all situations, as credit card issuers may block or refuse such transactions at their discretion.
termsAndConditionPage.withdrawalPolicyLine7: The internal operating currency of the Website is USD. Due to this fact, in case you transact in other currencies, the amount deducted from your credit card may be insignificantly higher than displayed at the time of transaction due to currency conversions on the side of your bank and/or the Casino's payment processing system.
termsAndConditionPage.withdrawalPolicyLine8: Withdrawal times occur within 24 hours and the withdrawal processing times are as follows: Interac, Visa, MasterCard: within 4-6 hours; Crypto Wallet within 2 hours.
termsAndConditionPage.withdrawalPolicyLine9: Take note that withdrawals can in exceptional cases be subject to additional charges by the intermediary banks and these charges remain outside the influence of The Casino.
termsAndConditionPage.withdrawalPolicyLine10: If you win more than 10,000 USD, the Casino reserves the right to divide the payout into monthly instalments until the full amount is paid out.
termsAndConditionPage.withdrawalPolicyLine11: All progressive jackpot wins will be paid in full.
termsAndConditionPage.dormantAccountsLine1: A Player Account that has not been signed into or logged out of for twelve (12) months is considered inactive (dormant). If your Player Account is deemed inactive, the Casino maintains the right to charge a monthly administration fee of 10 USD (or the current balance of your account, if less) as long as the balance of your account remains positive.
termsAndConditionPage.dormantAccountsLine2: You permit the Casino to deduct this amount from your Player Account at the start of the month following the day your account is deemed inactive, and at the start of each consecutive month your account stays inactive. If the account balance is zero or the account is reactivated, the Casino will stop deducting the charge.
termsAndConditionPage.refundPolicyLine1: A refund request will only be considered if it is requested within the first twenty-four (24) hours of the alleged transaction, or within thirty (30) calendar days if a Player alleges that another individual has accessed his/her Player Account.
termsAndConditionPage.refundPolicyLine2: If you have funded your account with a credit card, we reserve the right to reimburse all withdrawal requests as refunds against the transactions you have made up to the total amount deposited. If your withdrawals exceed your total deposit, the difference will be paid to you using one of our other payment methods.
termsAndConditionPage.refundPolicyLine3: Before a refund is processed all bonuses and winnings in your balance will be deducted prior to calculating the amount to be refunded.
termsAndConditionPage.refundPolicyLine4: If any Credit Card purchases are deemed to pose an unacceptable risk for security or legal reasons by either our Payment processors or the Casino, we shall reimburse any such transactions to the Credit Card and notify all relevant authorities and parties.
termsAndConditionPage.refundPolicyLine5: All fees incurred as a result of the refund procedure are the Player's responsibility.
termsAndConditionPage.expiryPeriodLine1: You agree that any claim and/or cause of action arising out of or related to these Terms and Conditions or a service provided by the Casino must be filed within one (1) year after such claim or cause of action arose.
termsAndConditionPage.bonusPolicyLine1: Terms of the Bonus Policy, available bonuses and the conditions for their receipt are listed on the
termsAndConditionPage.bonusPolicyLine2: The Casino reserves the right to amend the rules of the Bonus Policy at any time with notification of the Player about it, or without it.
termsAndConditionPage.bonusPolicyLine3: The Casino reserves the right to review the transaction history and logs for any reason and at any time. If during such a review the abuse of bonuses by the Player is found, the Casino has the right to cancel bonuses for the Player in question.
termsAndConditionPage.playerResponsibilityLine1: The Player fully understands the provisions contained in this Agreement and is obliged to comply with them.
termsAndConditionPage.playerResponsibilityLin2: The Player confirms that they are not a Casino employee or a relative of a Casino employee.
termsAndConditionPage.playerResponsibilityLine3: The Player acknowledges that their details in the personal account of the Casinos are correct.
termsAndConditionPage.playerResponsibilityLine4: The Player ensures that their age is 18 or older, but sufficient to participate in gambling, according to the legislation of the country of their residence.
termsAndConditionPage.playerResponsibilityLine5: The Player acknowledges that they have only one active gaming account with the Casino.
termsAndConditionPage.playerResponsibilityLine6: The Player is responsible for the security of the gaming account access data, as well as for the security of accounts in social networks that are used for gambling at the Casino.
termsAndConditionPage.playerResponsibilityLine7: The Player is obliged not to disclose the login details of their gaming account to third parties and not to allow the third parties to gamble at the Casino through their gaming account.
termsAndConditionPage.playerResponsibilityLine8: The Player is responsible for all actions taken at the Casino through their gaming account.
termsAndConditionPage.playerResponsibilityLine9: The Player acknowledges that they do not use the funds for third parties to replenish the Casino account.
termsAndConditionPage.playerResponsibilityLine10: The Player acknowledges that they are aware of the risk of losing money in the course of gambling.
termsAndConditionPage.playerResponsibilityLine11: The Player accepts the responsibility not to carry out illegal financial transactions, the legalization of proceeds from crime, and any other operation in violation of applicable law, through the Casino.
termsAndConditionPage.playerResponsibilityLine12: The Player agrees that the Casino has the right to require additional verification of their identity or their actions at the Casino website.
termsAndConditionPage.playerResponsibilityLine13: The Player understands that the Casino has the right to cancel their bets if: (i) the Player or a third party can affect the outcome of a bet; (ii) the Player or affiliated third parties violated the Terms and Conditions; (iii) the outcome of a bet was the result of illegal actions; (iv) the bet was made during any technical failure.
termsAndConditionPage.playerResponsibilityLine14: If the Player violates these rules, or the Casino has reasonable grounds to believe that the Player has violated the rules, the Casino reserves the right to suspend the Player's gaming account, cancel bets, refuse to pay winnings, or use funds on the Player's gaming account to compensate the Casino for its own losses caused by the Player's actions.
termsAndConditionPage.playerResponsibilityLine15: The withdrawal of monies is revoked and the Player's account is disabled if the Player fails to present the relevant papers within two weeks of the date of the withdrawal request. The Casino has the right to suspect the Player of criminal acts, casino fraud, misleading information, cheating, and other fraudulent conduct in this scenario. The Casino maintains the right to cancel all bets and wins, or to utilize cash on the Player's gaming account to compensate for its own losses and prospective third-party losses.
termsAndConditionPage.propertyRightsLine1: The content on the Casino website is protected by the Casino's copyright and other proprietary rights, or is used with permission from third-party rights holders. All downloadable or printed items on the website are limited to a single personal computer and can only be printed for personal, non-commercial purposes.
termsAndConditionPage.propertyRightsLine2: Under no circumstances does the use of the website provide the user any rights to the Casino's or any other third party's intellectual property (e.g. copyright, trademarks etc.) and it is forbidden to use or reproduce the trade name, trademarks, logos, or other creative elements displayed on this site.
termsAndConditionPage.propertyRightsLine3: Any damage, costs, or expenses incurred as a result of or in conjunction with any banned activity will be exclusively the Player's responsibility.
termsAndConditionPage.severabilityLine1: If any of the Terms becomes void, illegal, or loses its legality in any way, that term, condition, or provision will be separated to the extent required by law from the remaining provisions, terms, and conditions, which will keep their full validity.
termsAndConditionPage.arbitrationLine: All disputes which may arise between you and the Casino including their successors in title under general or special title as a result of these Terms and Conditions or as a result of further agreements and other acts in connection with these Terms and Conditions shall be settled exclusively by arbitration in Cyprus and in accordance with Cyprus Civil Procedure Rules.
termsAndConditionPage.NonTransferabilityLine1: The Player may not assign, pledge, or transfer ownership of any claims against the Casino resulting from these Terms and Conditions, your use of the Website, or the Player's participation in the Games without the Casino's prior written agreement.
termsAndConditionPage.NonTransferabilityLine2: This prohibition is based on article 83 paragraph 2 of book 3 of the Civil Code, and it prohibits the transfer of any assets of value of any kind, including but not limited to ownership of accounts, winnings, deposits, bets, rights and/or claims in connection with these assets, whether legal, commercial, or otherwise.
termsAndConditionPage.NonTransferabilityLine3: The restriction on stated transfers also includes, but is not limited to, encumbering, pledging, assigning, usufruct, trading, brokering, hypothecation, and/or gifting in any way shape or form in collaboration with a fiduciary or any other third party, firm, natural or legal individual, entity.

bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine1: The Player is responsible for checking and understanding bonus terms before engaging in any bonus promotional offers (free chips, deposit matching, comp points, cashback, manager bonuses, and so on). By redeeming any bonus, the Player agrees to the bonus terms and conditions listed below.
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine2: Wagering requirements apply to all casino bonuses. Before any payout can be made, the bonus must be wagered 35X. For example: the Eligible Player must wager the First Deposit amount plus the First Bonus amount 35 times to withdraw any funds won using the First Bonus. The Eligible Player will then need to wager the Second Deposit amount plus the Second Bonus amount 35 times to withdraw the funds won using the Second Bonus.
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine3: The Welcome Offer, with a total value of up to 8,000.00, includes:
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine4: 1ST DEPOSIT: 200% bonus up to 1,000.00 + 100 Free Spins.  Promo Code: BONUS1
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine5: 2ND DEPOSIT: 100% bonus up to 1,000.00.  Promo Code: BONUS2
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine6: 3RD DEPOSIT: 100% bonus up to 2,000.00.  Promo Code: BONUS3
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine7: 4TH DEPOSIT: 220% bonus up to 4,000.00 + 100 Free Spins.  Promo Code: BONUS4
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine8: Any bonus you will be limited to a maximum withdrawal value of 6 times your deposit amount and any remaining balance will be forfeited. This clause will only be applied at the discretion of casino management.
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine9: The maximum withdrawal amount processed to a player is 4,000 USD or currency equivalent per day , unless otherwise specified in the Terms & Conditions of a specific promotion. Exceptions may be made to players with a higher VIP level, if any, at the Casino's sole discretion.
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine10: The maximum withdrawal amount processed to a player is 8,000 USD or currency equivalent per week unless otherwise specified in the Terms & Conditions of a specific promotion. Exceptions may be made to players with a higher VIP level, if any, at the Casino's sole discretion.
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine11: The maximum withdrawal amount processed to a player is 30,000 USD or currency equivalent per month unless otherwise specified in the Terms & Conditions of a specific promotion. Exceptions may be made to players with a higher VIP level, if any, at the Casino's sole discretion.
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine12: If you win more than 30,000 USD the Casino reserves the right to divide the payout into monthly installments of maximum 30,000 USD until the full amount is paid out.
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine13: The maximum cash-out on free spins is $50 or currency equivalent. Make sure you have adequate funds available before requesting a withdrawal. When you request a withdrawal, the bonus amount will be subtracted automatically.
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine14: Due to the importance of fair gameplay, there is a limit on the maximum wager size that can be put during the play-through of any promotion bonuses (including cashback offers). Unless otherwise stated, the maximum wager amount permitted is $5 or currency equivalent. Any winnings will be void if you bet more than $5 or currency equivalent during an active play-through.
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine15: Wagering needs to be completed on specific game selection. Any wagers made on excluded games from the wagering while using the bonus will be considered void. The Player must be aware of bonus terms when claiming any promotional offers.
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine16: Each game may contribute differently for the bonus wagers. The Player can check the contribution table in the cashier section of their account after redeeming a bonus for details
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine17: 100%: all slots, Keno and scratch cards (re-spins on slots contribute 10%)
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine18: 50%: All NetEnt games as well as Red Tiger Games
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine19: 8%: Poker tables, Roulettes, Video/Power poker, Blackjack and Casino War
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine20: 2%: Classic Blackjack, All Aces and Jacks or Better video poker
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine21: 0%: Baccarat, Craps, Red Dog, Sic Bo and Progressive games
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine22: The casino does not apply any bonuses to the Players account automatically. If the Player wants to claim a promotional bonus, he or she must first redeem the coupon code before making a deposit.
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine23: Prior to making your initial deposit, you are only eligible for one free bonus. Any winnings will be declared void if more than one bonus is claimed without making a deposit.
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine24: All bonuses will be given only once per address / computer / IP address / household / Player / account as per general terms of use. If multiple accounts are opened the casino reserve the right to disable the account and void any remaining account balance.
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine25: While claiming a bonus, any wagers are made from the Players cash balance first then the bonus funds.
bonusTermsPage.bonusTermsLine26: Winnings from feature guarantee games, comp points, slots tournaments, Progressive Jackpot Games, or other events are subject to the bonus terms in effect at the time of the win.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine1: The Casino provides promotional offers via numerous media; nevertheless, only the offers original recipient is eligible to use it.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine2: All non-deposit bonus offers have a maximum cash out limit. Any bonus or free spins claimed prior to the first deposit will be subject to a $50 or currency equivalent maximum cash out limit and a 70X wagering requirement.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine3: All free no–deposit bonuses have a time frame of 30 days unless stated otherwise. If the terms of the bonus are not fulfilled in that timeframe any remaining balance will be removed.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine4: All Network Progressive games are excluded from any non-deposit coupons (sign up / free spins / cashback etc.)
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine5: Live dealer games are provided by Asia Gaming, BetGames.tv, eBet, Evolution, Ezugi, HollywoodTV, LiveG24, Media Live, OneTouchLive, Pragmatic Live, and Vivo Gaming software. All tables can only be accessed by real cash transfer available on Players account. General bonus terms and conditions will apply to any cash balance accumulated from using promotional bonus offers (e.g. cashback, deposit match etc...). Comp points cannot be accumulated while playing live dealer games. All bets made on live dealer games does not contribute towards wagering requirement.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine6: Cashback bonuses are based on each approved deposit transaction. The Player can only be credited for a transaction made in the previous 24 hours. Player may not be eligible for this promotion if 3 or more non-deposit bonuses have been credited since the last deposit was made or the last transaction on the account was a successful withdrawal. 5X Maximum Cashout restriction applies.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine7: If there is a win accumulated from a no-deposit bonus and a payout is requested, a single deposit is required in order to validate the account and proceed with the request.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine8: The Bonus Wheel Promotion is available only to Players who have deposited and are allowed a free spin on the wheel every 2 hours where they can either win Free Spins on Book of Tombs, Free Cash, Free Match Deposit Bonuses or ‘Better Luck Next Time'.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine9: Players from the following countries are restricted from claiming any bonuses on offer: Afghanistan, Aruba, Bonaire, Burma, Congo, Curacao, Eritrea, Ethiopia, France, Iran, Iraq, Libya, Malaysia, Myanmar, The Netherlands, North Korea, Palestine, Saba, Singapore, Somalia, Statia, St. Maarten, Sudan, Syria, Singapore, United Kingdom, Yemen, Zimbabwe.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine10: There is no maximum cash out limit on any deposit bonus offers unless stated otherwise, except for the Free Spins as stated above. However a 10,000 USD maximum withdrawal limit per month does apply as per our terms and conditions
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine11: Bonuses may be refused if there is a suspicion of promotion abuse. All withdrawals will be audited and declined if there is a suspicion of fraud or misuse, or at the discretion of the casino management.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine12: Before claiming any promotion offer, the Player should double-check their account information (name, address, email, and phone number). If any of the personal account data are incorrect, the account will be suspended and any remaining amount will be forfeited.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine13: All casino promotional offers are subject to status, should you require more information contact customer support or check the web site / casino lobby for further details.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine14: Casino has the right to change / amend / discontinue any promotion or terms of offers without a notice. It is Player responsibility to review the Terms and Conditions periodically and check rules in promotional emails.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine15: By redeeming and playing with any casino promotion offers the Player is agreeing to the terms and conditions listed above as well as specific bonus terms of received offer. The Player is not required to use bonuses and shouldn't do so if terms and conditions are not fully understood.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine16: If the bonus was claimed in error the Player can remove the bonus code via cashier section of the account or contact customer support team.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine17: Bonus codes can only be applied one at a time.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine18: The casino operates on eastern standard time (EST) for all bonuses to ensure consistency for all Players world wide.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine19: Playable balance must be below $1 before a bonus or deposit is applied to the account. Otherwise this may affect withdrawals or maximum cashout restrictions.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine20: Whilst there is a pending withdrawal on the casino account, free bonuses will not be applied to the account.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine21: Europa777 reserves the right to amend / change add or remove any of the above terms whenever required. We recommend saving the copy of this page or print it off and store in safe place.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine22: Whilst there is a pending withdrawal on the casino account, free bonuses will not be applied to the account.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine23: Europa777 reserves the right to amend / change add or remove any of the above terms whenever required. We recommend saving the copy of this page or print it off and store in safe place
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine24: Both the bonus and the winnings will be removed once the bonus expires.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine25: Any bonus can be cancelled before you start playing it through. Otherwise, by cancelling the bonus the player accepts that all the winnings gained while playing with this bonus, if any, and the bonus amount are deducted from the player's balance. Please contact Europa777's support service to find out more about cancelling your bonus.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine26: The management of the Europa777 casino reserves the right to withhold or seize any bonuses or winnings gained as a result of fraudulent or otherwise unfair practices.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine27: Bonuses offered by Europa777 are intended for genuine recreational players only. The bonuses are not intended to give away free money to players classified as “bonus hunters” or “bonus abusers”.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine28: Europa777 management will review all player accounts and classify them at their discretion. Once a Player is classified as a “bonus hunter” or “bonus abuser”, all winnings and bonuses will be voided.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine29: At the Europa777 casino it's forbidden to abuse the bonus offers available (customer bonus ratio (deposits : bonuses) over 50%). If any such cases come to light, the casino reserves the right to seize any winnings gained as a result of abusing the bonus offers and disable the option of using any bonuses for that account in future.
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine30: It's forbidden to postpone any playing rounds, including free spins and bonus rounds, for the time when you no longer need to play the bonus through and/or make new deposit(s).
bonusTermsPage.bonusConditionLine31: If the Casino mistakenly credit your Player Account with a bonus or winnings that do not belong to you, whether due to a technical issue, error in the paytables, human error or otherwise, the amount and/or the winnings from such bonus will remain the Casino property and will be deducted from your Player Account. If you have withdrawn funds that do not belong to you prior to us becoming aware of the error, the mistakenly paid amount will (without prejudice to other remedies and actions that may be available at law) constitute a debt owed by you to us. In the event of an incorrect crediting, you are obliged to notify us immediately by email.

privacyAndSecurityPolicyPage.privacyPolicyLine: This page is for the more concerned player to provide you assurance that your privacy will be maintained as well as a full disclosure of the information that we gather and how it will and will not be used. We reat our players data as if it were our own, and we take great care to ensure that the greatest levels of personal privacy are maintained at all times.
privacyAndSecurityPolicyPage.informationGatheredLine1: You will be asked to submit information such as your name, address, phone number, and email address when you register. This information will be saved on our secure servers alone by us and will never be shared with any third parties.
privacyAndSecurityPolicyPage.informationGatheredLine2: By registering to use our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to the Europa777 Terms and Conditions.
privacyAndSecurityPolicyPage.protectionOfInformationLine1: Europa777.com is scanned for vulnerabilities on a regular basis to guarantee that your information is kept as safe as possible.
privacyAndSecurityPolicyPage.protectionOfInformationLine2: All personal information is held on a secure network, and only a small number of people with the appropriate security clearance can access or alter it.
privacyAndSecurityPolicyPage.protectionOfInformationLine3: Any information provided is kept strictly confidential at all times.
privacyAndSecurityPolicyPage.protectionOfInformationLine4: Any payment information you enter is encrypted using the most up-to-date SSL technology to protect you from malicious or fraudulent internet behavior.
privacyAndSecurityPolicyPage.protectionOfInformationLine5: No payment information is retained on our servers; instead, it is sent via a secure gateway provider for maximum security.
privacyAndSecurityPolicyPage.useOfInformationLine1: We will only use your personal information to reply to inquiries or provide you with information about your account, such as available withdrawals or bonuses.
privacyAndSecurityPolicyPage.useOfInformationLine2: We may also send you emails on a regular basis to advise you of any seasonal promotions or offers to which you may be entitled and/or interested.
privacyAndSecurityPolicyPage.cookiesLine: We use cookies (if you allow on your browser) to maximise your experience when navigating the site. This is to allow the site to pick up and recognise preferences based on your previous activity whilst playing with us, this allows us to ensure that when making any changes to the site we can establish what works well and what doesn’t. This will help us to improve the overall experience that our players have when updating certain aspects of the site.
privacyAndSecurityPolicyPage.canSpamActLine1: The CAN-SPAM Act defines standards for commercial email, establishes requirements for commercial messaging, allows recipients the ability to have emails sent to them stopped, and spells out harsh consequences for violations.
privacyAndSecurityPolicyPage.canSpamActLine2: To be in accordance with CAN-SPAM, we agree to the following:
privacyAndSecurityPolicyPage.canSpamActLine3: Allow users to unsubscribe by using the link at the bottom of each email.
privacyAndSecurityPolicyPage.canSpamActLine4: Include the physical address of our business or site headquarters.
privacyAndSecurityPolicyPage.canSpamActLine5: Monitor third-party email marketing services for compliance, if one is used.
privacyAndSecurityPolicyPage.canSpamActLine6: Not use false or misleading subjects or email addresses.
privacyAndSecurityPolicyPage.canSpamActLine7: Identify the message as an advertisement in some reasonable way.
privacyAndSecurityPolicyPage.securityPolicyLine1: Europa777 assures that our players information is kept safe and secure at all times by using the most up-to-date software available. We have a team of highly qualified Casino Hosts on hand to set your mind at ease and deal with even the most difficult problems.
privacyAndSecurityPolicyPage.securityPolicyLine2: With an ever-expanding internet market, trusting an online casino can be a challenging decision. Our basic values at Europa777 are honesty and integrity, and all of our games are independently audited to guarantee that all of our players have a fair chance at the jackpots. We can be confident that your wins will be paid directly to your account as soon as possible thanks to our expert cashier team.
privacyAndSecurityPolicyPage.securityPolicyLine3: Our Casino Support is something we take pride in, and our hosts are here for support 24/7 to make your time with us as enjoyable as possible. Our hosts are trained in all facets of the casino and can handle any inquiry from beginning to end, ensuring that you are treated efficiently and professionally at all times.

responsibleGambLinkPage.responsibleGambLine1: Europa777 is dedicated to responsible gaming, and we will always take the necessary steps to guarantee that we are completely supportive of all of our players in this regard.
responsibleGambLinkPage.responsibleGambLine2: We ensure that the games we provide bring enjoyment to all who choose to play, however we know that we also have a responsibility to all our players.
responsibleGambLinkPage.responsibleGambLine3: Whilst we understand that for many people online gaming is a hobby and provides a form of great entertainment, however gambling can lead to some players becoming addicted and thus using our services to fuel their addiction.
responsibleGambLinkPage.responsibleGambLine4: To ensure that you are gambling responsibly we have suggested some guidelines for you to follow:
responsibleGambLinkPage.responsibleGambLine6: Do not gamble if you are recovering from a dependency or if you are under the influence of alcohol or any other substance.
responsibleGambLinkPage.responsibleGambLine7: Give yourself a set amount of playing time and limit yourself to this time win or lose.
responsibleGambLinkPage.responsibleGambLine8: Do not rely on gambling as a source of income or to chase your losses.
responsibleGambLinkPage.responsibleGambLine9: Do not let gambling interfere with other aspects of your daily life.
responsibleGambLinkPage.responsibleGambLine10: Set yourself limits within your means, for both purchasing and losses before you begin.
responsibleGambLinkPage.responsibleGambLine11: If you feel at any point that your gambling is becoming irresponsible, our casino hosts have several options at their disposal to assist you and put you in touch with professionals or lead you in the right direction to seek additional help. On our side, you can request for us to put the following in place:
responsibleGambLinkPage.responsibleGambLine12: Deposit Limits - We can assist by setting you daily, weekly or even monthly limits to ensure that you are in control of the amounts that you spend, this can be done upon request and can even be requested for a set period after which if you wish we can come back to review.
responsibleGambLinkPage.responsibleGambLine13: Cooling Off Period - Take a break from your account; perhaps you've had a bad run and need a break; you can ask for your account to be suspended for a specific amount of time.
responsibleGambLinkPage.responsibleGambLine14: Self-Exclusion - If you've tried all of the other alternatives and still don't feel in control, self-exclusion may be the best option for you. To do so, speak with one of the casino hosts, who will gladly be able to action this for you.

faqPage.faqDes1: We are a online casino where gambling activities are hosted by numbers renowned gaming providers in the industry with over 3100 games to play. Click here to learn more about us
faqPage.faqDes2: We accept CAD, USD, GBP, and EUR. However, you can deposit in certain cryptocurrencies that will be converted to your choice of the aformentioned currencies to play in. See the Payment Page
faqPage.faqDes3: Europa777 is available to most players from around the world, unfortunately however, players from the following the following countries are restricted from registering: Afghanistan, Aruba, Bonaire, Burma, Congo, Curacao, Eritrea, Ethiopia, France, Iran, Iraq, Libya, Malaysia, Myanmar, The Netherlands, North Korea, Palestine, Saba, Singapore, Somalia, Statia, St. Maarten, Sudan, Syria, Singapore, United Kingdom, Yemen, and Zimbabwe.
faqPage.faqDes4: Our amazing bonuses will have different terms and conditions, so read them carefully before accepting. If you have any further questions, please contact our brilliant Support Team.
faqPage.faqTitle5: 5. How do I claim a bonus ?
faqPage.faqDes5: All bonuses will have a coupon code for you to redeem, once you have chosen the bonus you will like to use
faqPage.faqDes5One: Go to the Dashboard section in the from left side menu
faqPage.faqDes5Four: Make your deposit and the bonus will be added automatically
faqPage.faqDes6: All our bonuses have their own terms and conditions and the wagering requirement specifies how many times the bonus funds have to be wagered before making a withdrawal. You will however see the bonus requirements below each bonus on the
faqPage.faqDes7: Welcome bonuses provide new players with bonus monies equal to a percentage of their initial deposit to welcome them to the casino and give them a taste of whats on offer.
faqPage.faqTitle8: 8. What if I have a problem or complaint ?
faqPage.faqDes8: That is why our excellent Support Team are there for you 24/7 to assist you with anything you may need via our live chat function or email at support@canada777.com
faqPage.faqTitle9: 9. Is there a minimum or maximum deposit or withdrawal limit ?
faqPage.faqDes9: There is a minimum accepted deposit of US$ 20 or currency equivalent to make your way to winning.
faqPage.faqDes9One: The minimum withdrawal is US$ 50 or currency equivalent with a maximum daily (24 hour period) withdrawal limit of $4,000.
faqPage.faqDes10: Absolutely, all games allow you to play for real cash prizes and luck jackpots along the way. If you feel the need to practice a bit first, you can play the games in Demo.
faqPage.faqTitle11: 11. How can I deposit or withdraw ?
faqPage.faqDes11: The following deposit and withdrawal methods are available at Europa777: Interac, Visa, MasterCard, Crypto Wallet: BTC, LTC, ETH, TRX (Tron), BNB (Binance coin), BUSB (Binance USD). Learn ore on our Payments page.

aboutPage.title: Welcome to the luckiest casino
aboutPage.des1: Europa777 is your best bet at getting an all-round game experience where luck is the name of the game.
aboutPage.des2: As one of the best online casinos, we have made it our mission to create a gaming site that offers you the perfect platform to try your luck at.
aboutPage.des3: Our bag of lucky charms is stacked with the best online games, in fact there is an incredible number of over 8000 games that have the potential of leading you on a lucky winning streak. What's more is that there are over 75 gaming providers who provide these games for your entertainment.
aboutPage.des4: So get lucky and explore the enormous variety of games that cater to a wide range of gaming tastes. Roll the lucky dice and more on table games, spin your way to the pot of gold on slots, and turn the tables into cash in live dealer games.
aboutPage.des5: Not only are we the best online casino for Canadian players, Europa777 allows players from around the world to try their luck here too and is available in 15 different languages.
aboutPage.des6: To cater to a world of players, we have made multiple payments methods available so that you can turn your luck into a buck in no time.
aboutPage.des7: We are the lucky enough to have the best support team around who are there for you 27/7 via Live Chat or email.
aboutPage.des8: So go ahead and browse the site for more information. Visit the FAQ section to get you started and then get a lucky break and register in a few quick steps and become a player at not only the luckiest, but best online casino around!
